title: Ledger Finds Popular Smartphone Chip Vulnerable to Unpatchable Attacks
contentSnippet: A report by the provider of crypto wallets shows that a Mediatek Dimensity 7300 chip could be compromised at its lowest level.

title: High-Leveraged Crypto ETF Applications on Hold After SEC Warnings
contentSnippet: Leveraged crypto and other ETFs already exist for U.S. investors, but the SEC wants issuers to address risk concerns over proposed products.

title: BlackRock Remains Risk-on as ‘Mega Forces’ Like AI, Stablecoins Transform Financial Markets
contentSnippet: Global investment firm BlackRock is staying risk-on and overweight U.S. equities as AI leads market forces heading into 2026.

title: Connecticut Orders Kalshi, Robinhood, Crypto.com to Cease Sports Betting
contentSnippet: The state issued cease-and-desist orders to the firms to stop conducting "unlicensed online gambling" via their sports events contracts.

title: Fusaka rollout kicks off Ethereum’s new twice-a-year hard-fork schedule
contentSnippet: Consensys said Ethereum researchers are now looking to “roll out hard forks on an accelerated twice-a-year cadence."

title: Ethereum Activates Fusaka Upgrade, Aiming to Cut Node Costs, Speed Layer-2 Settlements
contentSnippet: At the center of the upgrade is PeerDAS, a system that lets validators check small slices of data rather than entire “blobs,” reducing both costs and computational load for validators and layer-2 netw

title: Fanatics Enters Prediction Markets With App Live in 10 States
contentSnippet: Sport clothing and collectibles giant Fanatics has launched Fanatics Markets, letting users trade outcomes of sports, politics and more — with crypto and IPO bets coming by 2026.

title: Sports apparel giant Fanatics launches prediction market with Crypto.com
contentSnippet: Like Polymarket and Kalshi, Fanatics Markets will let users trade contracts across sports, finance, economics, and politics.

title: Binance Unveils New Crypto Savings Account for Kids
contentSnippet: Binance Junior accounts will be limited to moving funds back to parent accounts or to other Junior accounts, with on-chain withdrawals unavailable.

title: LINK Surges 7% as Grayscale’s Chainlink ETF Sees $37M in First-Day Inflow
contentSnippet: The oracle token outperformed most major cryptocurrencies as U.S. investors gained ETF access to LINK for the first time.

title: Mistral Roars Back With Frontier AI Family That Goes Head to Head With DeepSeek
contentSnippet: French startup Mistral releases a 4-model AI family, challenging DeepSeek with frontier performance and EU data sovereignty for enterprises wary of Chinese alternatives.

title: Bitcoin Hovers Near Production Cost as Bull/Bear Line Tightens
contentSnippet: Difficulty and network valuation models point to BTC hovering around fair value near $90,000.

title: Is Bitcoin Treasury Giant Strategy 'Too Big To Fail'?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury company Strategy is not too big to fail, say some company observers, but others disagree.

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Tells Joe Rogan AI Race Is Real, but It Won’t Have a Clear Winner
contentSnippet: In a wide-ranging interview, Huang claims AI growth is gradual, powerful and already changing global power dynamics.

title: Solana Mobile to Launch SKR Token in January With 10B Supply
contentSnippet: Distribution is designed to go to the ecosystem, With 30% to airdrops, 25% to growth initiatives, and 10% for liquidity and launch support.

title: CryptoQuant says Strategy prepares for a bitcoin bear market as it sets up US dollar reserve
contentSnippet: CQ’s Julio Moreno told The Block that if the bear market continues, bitcoin could trade between $70,000 and $55,000 next year.

title: Solana Mobile says SKR token launch is coming in January
contentSnippet: The SKR token, native to Solana mobile ecosystem, is designed to power control, economics, incentives, and ownership.

title: Coinbase CEO Armstrong Says Banks That Don't Adapt Stablecoin Will be 'Left Behind'
contentSnippet: CEO Brian Armstrong said top banks are "leaning into this as an opportunity," signaling Wall Street’s quiet embrace of crypto infrastructure.

title: Was the Bitcoin Jump a 'Fake Breakout'?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin surged on Tuesday but lost momentum. Analysts debate whether the rally will last as markets brace for the Federal Reserve's rate decision next week.

title: Polymarket Launches App With CFTC Green Light in U.S. Return
contentSnippet: Armed with CFTC approval, Polymarket has launched its mobile platform for sports and proposition markets under federal oversight.

title: Franklin Templeton launches Solana ETF, expanding Wall Street’s crypto offerings
contentSnippet: Asset management firm Franklin Templeton debuted its Solana exchange-traded fund, adding to its list of crypto-related investment products.

title: The Daily: UK passes crypto property law, Firelight launches XRP staking protocol on Flare, Trump brothers’ American Bitcoin plunges, plus more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Crypto UP 7-10%, Bank of America recommends crypto, Kalshi raise $11B
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are sharply higher, climbing 6–10% following Vanguard’s crypto debut and supportive commentary from Bank of America, with BTC up 6% to $92,900, ETH up 9% to $3,070, BNB up 7% to $899, an

title: Filecoin Gains 2% Alongside Crypto Rally
contentSnippet: The token tracked broader crypto sentiment on below-average volume, establishing an ascending trend.

title: IREN refuels balance sheet with $3.6 billion financing as AI-cloud buildout accelerates
contentSnippet: The refinancing removes a major dilution overhang for IREN by canceling older notes that converted at prices far below current levels.

title: Polymarket begins opening US app to users on the waitlist
contentSnippet: The CFTC banned Polymarket from operating in the U.S. in 2022 for operating an unregistered derivatives exchange.

title: Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin Steadies After ‘First Major Unlock' of Shares
contentSnippet: The stock was volatile after insiders took profits.

title: Harvard alumni-founded Ostium lands $24 million in fresh funding to scale onchain perpetuals for RWAs
contentSnippet: RWA-focused protocol Ostium has raised $24 million to scale its decentralized perpetuals exchange beyond U.S. markets.

title: Bitcoin market fears are overblown as policy shifts open medium-term upside, K33 says
contentSnippet: Upcoming U.S. policy changes, 401(k) access, and pro-crypto regulatory momentum create a stronger medium-term backdrop for bitcoin, K33 said.

title: Bitcoin back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on a tokenized future, Kalshi raise $11B - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet:
Your Decrypt daily recap with @tyler_did_it for December 3rd 2025

Today’s headlines: BTC jumps back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on tokenized assets, Kalshi raise $11B, & more

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
